00025 require '../../../sysconfig.inc.php';
00026 // session checking
00027 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin/default/session.inc.php';
00028 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin/default/session_check.inc.php';
00029 
00030 $table_fields = trim($_POST['tableFields']);
00031 
00032 if (isset($_POST['keywords']) AND !empty($_POST['keywords'])) {
00033     $keywords = urldecode(trim($_POST['keywords']));
00034 } else {
00035     $keywords = '';
00036 }
00037 
00038 // explode table fields data
00039 $fields = str_replace(':', ', ', $table_fields);
00040 // set where criteria
00041 $criteria = '';
00042 foreach (explode(':', $table_fields) as $field) {
00043     $criteria .= " $field LIKE '%$keywords%' OR";
00044 }
00045 // remove the last OR
00046 $criteria = substr_replace($criteria, '', -2);
00047 
00048 // sql string
00049 $sql_string = "SELECT DISTINCT i.biblio_id, b.title, i.item_code FROM item AS i
00050     INNER JOIN biblio AS b ON i.biblio_id=b.biblio_id WHERE ".$criteria." LIMIT 5";
00051 
00052 // send query to database
00053 $query = $dbs->query($sql_string);
00054 $error = $dbs->error;
00055 if ($error) {
00056     die('<option value="0">SQL ERROR : '.$error.'</option>');
00057 }
00058 
00059 if ($query->num_rows > 0) {
00060     while ($row = $query->fetch_row()) {
00061         echo '<option value="'.$row[2].'">'.$row[2].' - '.$row[1].'</option>'."\n";
00062     }
00063 } else {
00064     // output the SQL string
00065     // echo '<option value="0">'.$sql_string.'</option>';
00066     echo '<option value="0">NO DATA FOUND</option>';
00067 }
00068 ?>
